Text:
This is a film version of The Eagle of The Ninth by Rosemary Sutcliffe I am hoping it will not be a disappointment as books even audio ones which is how I experienced it give wings to the imagination and in general video media kills it.

Thanks for the upload:) A great find for my day off
awesome quality!! its as if you rented the dvd. has menu, features, and settings for subtitles. Thanks a lot!
